thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Taihua New Material sees FY 2017 net profit up about 55 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Taihua New Material sees FY 2017 net profit up about 55 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang taihua new material co ltd

text:
Jan 25(Reuters) - Zhejiang Taihua New Material Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by about 55 percent
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 227.6 million yuan
* Says increased income from main business and increased gross margin are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/dxjWTd
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
